title: Salamander firebrand

| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The rarest of the salamander castes, possessed of fearsome agility and unparallelled martial prowess. Their mastery of fire is woven into every strike of their weapons, filling the air around their opponent with sweltering flames. |

## Useful Info

**Salamander firebrands** were fast-moving [salamanders](/List_of_nagas#Salamander_Types "List of nagas") which created a ring of flame [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud") around their enemies when they attacked in melee. They could be found in the [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit"), [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths") and the [Vestibule of Hell](/Vestibule_of_Hell "Vestibule of Hell").

## Tips & Tricks

- As is the case with all salamanders, [fire](/Fire "Fire") resistance greatly reduces the threat they pose. With sufficient resistance and [AC](/AC "AC"), you can likely ignore the flame clouds they produce without taking much damage. If you *don't* have fire resistance, however, consider [blinking](/Blink "Blink") if you need to escape without getting scorched.

## History

- Salamander firebrands were removed in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").
- Salamander firebrands were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").

Salamander firebrand

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
salamander firebrand N 
HP 60-135
HD 15
XP 1339
Speed 10 (swim: 70%)
AC 5
EV 15
Will 80
Attack1 28 (hit: firebrand)


Resistances rF+++
Vulnerabilities Cold
Habitat Amphibious lava
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type salamander, salamander
Flags Fighter
Submerges
Warm-blooded
The rarest of the salamander castes, possessed of fearsome agility and unparallelled martial prowess. Their mastery of fire is woven into every strike of their weapons, filling the air around their opponent with sweltering flames.

Useful Info

Salamander firebrands were fast-moving salamanders which created a ring of flame clouds around their enemies when they attacked in melee. They could be found in the Snake Pit, the Depths and the Vestibule of Hell.

Tips & Tricks

  • As is the case with all salamanders, fire resistance greatly reduces the threat they pose. With sufficient resistance and AC, you can likely ignore the flame clouds they produce without taking much damage. If you don't have fire resistance, however, consider blinking if you need to escape without getting scorched.

History

  • Salamander firebrands were removed in 0.18.
  • Salamander firebrands were added in 0.14.
